verses.verse: <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3289>consulted<s%> with the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> even with every <S%H5057>leader.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "If it seems <S%H2895>good<s%> to <S%H3068>you,<s%> and if it is of Yahweh our <S%H430>God,<s%> let us <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H6555>abroad<s%> everywhere to our <S%H251>brothers<s%> who are <S%H7604>left<s%> in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> with whom the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and <S%H3881>Levites<s%> are in their <S%H5892>cities<s%> that have <S%H4054>suburbs,<s%> that they may gather themselves to <S%H6908>us;<s%>
and let us bring <S%H5437>again<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H1875>us.<s%> For we didn't seek it in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>"
All the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> that they would do <S%H6213>so;<s%> for the <S%H1697>thing<s%> was <S%H3474>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6950>together,<s%> from the <S%H7883>Shihor<s%> the brook of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> even to the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> from Kiriath <S%H7157>Jearim.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H5927>up,<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H1173>Baalah,<s%> that <S%H7157>is,<s%> to Kiriath Jearim, which belonged to <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> to bring <S%H5927>up<s%> from there the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> that <S%H3427>sits<s%> above the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> that is <S%H7121>called<s%> by the <S%H8034>Name.<s%>

They <S%H7392>carried<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> on a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5699>cart,<s%> and brought it out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H41>Abinadab:<s%> and <S%H5798>Uzza<s%> and <S%H283>Ahio<s%> <S%H5090>drove<s%> the <S%H5699>cart.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7832>played<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> with all their <S%H5797>might,<s%> even with <S%H7892>songs,<s%> and with <S%H3658>harps,<s%> and with stringed <S%H5035>instruments,<s%> and with <S%H8596>tambourines,<s%> and with <S%H4700>cymbals,<s%> and with <S%H2689>trumpets.<s%>

When they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1637>threshing<s%> floor of <S%H3592>Chidon,<s%> <S%H5798>Uzza<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H270>hold<s%> the <S%H727>ark;<s%> for the <S%H1241>oxen<s%> <S%H8058>stumbled.<s%>

The <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H5798>Uzza,<s%> and he <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H7971>him,<s%> because he put forth his <S%H3027>hand<s%> to the <S%H727>ark;<s%> and there he <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H2734>displeased,<s%> because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H6556>broken<s%> <S%H6555>forth<s%> on <S%H5798>Uzza;<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> that <S%H4725>place<s%> Perez <S%H5798>Uzza,<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1963>"How<s%> shall I <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of God home to <S%H430>me?<s%>"

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5493>didn't<s%> move the <S%H727>ark<s%> to him into the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> but carried it <S%H5186>aside<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5654>Obed-Edom<s%> the <S%H1663>Gittite.<s%>

The <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3427>remained<s%> with the <S%H1004>family<s%> of <S%H5654>Obed-Edom<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2320>months:<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5654>Obed-Edom,<s%> and all that he had.
